summary: Provides utilities for managing PostgreSQL connections in both synchronous and asynchronous contexts, handling connection pooling, generating CREATE TABLE statements from pandas or pyarrow dataframes, inserting dataframe data into tables, and extracting table schemas for query building.
business_intent: Enable Feast SDK users to interact with PostgreSQL efficiently by abstracting connection management and automating dataframe-to-SQL translation, reducing manual SQL work and improving data ingestion workflows.
